bibl.title: Bilingual Papyrological Archives.
The Multilingual Experience in Egypt, from the Ptolemies to the Abbasids
bibl.note: Definition. - The importance of the archaeological context. - The archive of Sarapammon and Sarapias. - Limits of the archaeological context: The cantina dei papiri at Tebtynis. - The archaeological context neglected: The ostraca of Karanis. - The lack of an archaeological context. - The archive(s) of the choachytes. - Museum archaeology. - Records of papyrological archives. - Public archives and private archives: The tomoi synkollesimoi. - Bilingual archives. - Private Demotic archives including Greek texts. - Greek private archives containing Demotic texts. - Archives of officials. - Mixed archives. - Tax receipts. - Preliminary conclusions.
